entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
